description:
Does your garden or yard need an update, but you don't know where to start? Have you looked hiring a designer or landscape architect, only to realize it would cost you hundreds to thousands of dollars? Or, did you get a free design from a local nursery, and noticed that, well, it left a lot to be desired?

If you want a professionally designed garden, and you like to DIY, this is the course for you! 

In this course, you'll not only learn the techniques professional designer use, you'll create your own customized design.  Each lecture includes an assignment that will help guide you, step by step, through creating a garden or landscape design!
title: DIY Garden Design
